solution_list.title: Virtuozzo Hybrid Infrastructure (IaaS)
solution_list.description: Turnkey OpenStack cloud for service providers. Sell public, private, hybrid cloud: a more flexible, cost efficient & profitable hyperscale alternative.

success_case_list.title: Ataraxie delivers fast, efficient VPS hosting with Virtuozzo Hybrid Server
success_case_list.description: Originally a Geographic Information Systems specialist – and still a major player in GIS hosting in France today – Ataraxie now provides server management, ADSL, SDSL, Fiber connectivity, dedicated servers, VoIP and Exchange hosting, and VPS hosting powered by Virtuozzo.

success_case_list.title: Sharktech brings its unique service focus to cloud, powered by Virtuozzo
success_case_list.description: Sharktech has been in the hosting business for almost 20 years, and has a clear focus on service quality, network expertise, DDoS mitigation and high-quality support.

success_case_list.title: Ulink grows its distribution business with Virtuozzo Hybrid Infrastructure
success_case_list.description: From its launch as a systems integrator and Value-Added Reseller, 25 years ago, Ulink has grown to become a successful solutions and distribution partner for customers and resellers across Taiwan – where the company is based – as well in Myanmar, Korea, Japan, Thailand, Singapore and China.

success_case_list.title: Blockchain specialist Chainstack reduces TCO by 30% using Virtuozzo Hybrid Cloud
success_case_list.description: Chainstack provides a managed blockchain platform for developers building decentralized applications, trading applications, or any application that depends on a secure, unalterable ledger of transactions.

success_case_list.title: Newfold Digital International unifies its technology stack with Virtuozzo Hybrid Server
success_case_list.description: Newfold Digital International provides a comprehensive range of web-presence solutions, including web and Wordpress hosting, email hosting, server hosting, domain name registration, online marketing tools and related web technologies, in global markets including the Asia Pacific region and the United Kingdom.
success_case_list.image_url: Chainstack provides a managed blockchain platform for developers building decentralized applications, trading applications, or any application that depends on a secure, unalterable ledger of transactions.

success_case_list.title: DT reinvents as a Digital Platform enabler using Virtuozzo Hybrid Infrastructure
success_case_list.description: The Turkey-based company first launched in 2006 as a systems integrator focused on information and communication technology (ICT) installations. Over time, DT identified a growing opportunity in telecommunications and ultimately established itself as a key player in Turkey’s telecom innovation boom—creating a strong carrier infrastructure, delivering 2G, 3G and subsequently 4G mobile access networks to thousands of sites nationwide.

success_case_list.title: Stock Distribuidora builds its Latin America cloud business with Virtuozzo Hybrid Infrastructure
success_case_list.description: Stock, a leading Brazilian distributor, partners with Virtuozzo to enable Anything-as-a-Service for MSPs and CSPs across South America, through its reseller network.

success_case_list.title: Cloud South embarks on its next growth phase with Virtuozzo Hybrid Infrastructure
success_case_list.description: By 2013 Cloud South had diversified into dedicated servers and the nascent cloud space. Today it owns two Tier 4 datacenters and manages some 3,500 servers for customers across the Americas, and as far afield as India, Romania and Vietnam.

success_case_list.title: Easy On Net launches next-gen reseller cloud, powered by Virtuozzo Hybrid Infrastructure
success_case_list.description: Easy On Net is a new cloud service that offers fully isolated, high-performance infrastructure for MSPs and hosting resellers, without the drawbacks of traditional shared hosting.

success_case_list.title: Prov.net Launches Alpha3 Cloud, Powered by Virtuozzo Hybrid Infrastructure
success_case_list.description: Alpha3 Cloud, the latest innovation from Prov.net, offers a better alternative to hyperscale cloud for MSPs, CSPs, ISV, enterprise and telco customers – reducing virtualization costs, optimizing cloud spend, improving productivity and decreasing time-to-market.

success_case_list.title: A Win-Win for Joe’s Datacenter with Virtuozzo Hybrid Infrastructure
success_case_list.description: Joe’s Datacenter is a successful U.S. Cloud Service Provider with a unique brand and ethos. Founded by Joe Morgan in 2008, Joe’s has grown to become a full-service cloud provider with customers across the U.S. and internationally.

success_case_list.title: The Game Changer for TLine: Virtuozzo Hybrid Infrastructure
success_case_list.description: From its roots as a hardware reseller, to becoming a full cloud service provider and the first digital solutions broker in Latin America, TLine makes digital transformation easy for its SME and MSP customers.

solution_list.title: OpenVZ
solution_list.description: Turnkey OpenStack cloud for service providers. Sell public, private, hybrid cloud: a more flexible, cost efficient & profitable hyperscale alternative.

solution_list.title: Virtuozzo Application Platform (PaaS)
solution_list.description: Elastic, high-performance PaaS solution for service providers. The easy way to sell cloud hosting to DevOps-focused companies.

solution_list.title: Virtuozzo OnApp
solution_list.description: OnApp makes it easy to build, manage and sell your own brand of IaaS cloud. It’s the complete cloud management solution for service providers. Since 2021, OnApp is a division of Virtuozzo.
